projects.title: COVID-19 Visualizer
projects.desc: An interactive coronavirus tracker used by over 25 million people, placing data from Worldometer on a Three.js globe.

projects.title: AccessIDE
projects.desc: An accessible and time-saving online IDE utilizing voice input and output along with powerful keyboard shortcuts. On GitHub.
projects.award: Featured in Bloomberg, Finalist at TartanHacks 2019

projects.title: PAETHOS
projects.desc: A virtual reality experience that utilizes EEG sensors to turn brainwaves into an interactive and educational art piece.

projects.title: Rana Abdelhamid's Website
projects.desc: Developed for Rana Abdelhamid: human rights organizer, black belt, and entrepreneur. Built to increase her social presence and promote her work.

projects.title: Centre News
projects.desc: A responsive web app to combat polarizing media bias by presenting a variety of politically diverse news sources on the same website.
projects.award: Winner of 2017 Congressional App Challenge/nlNew York 12th District

projects.title: College Organizer
projects.desc: A personal project, designed to automate a large portion of the tedious college researching process, using College Scorecard API and Firebase.

projects.title: Fruit Sensei
projects.desc: Developed for StuyHacks, a parody of the famous Fruit Ninja that connects your phone to your display, in an attempt to slice as many fruits as possible.

projects.title: All Star Wars
projects.desc: Developed for All Star Code, a (virtual reality supported) game that connects your phone to your display, allowing you to wield a lightsaber.

skills.name: html
skills.desc: The stucture and backbone of every website, I have thorough experience with HTML 5, and it's integration with CSS, Search Engine Optimization through meta data, etc.

skills.name: css
skills.desc: The style and design behind most of the internet, CSS 3 is my medium for creativity in websites, along with mobile readiness through media queries and libraries such as Bootstrap.

skills.name: js
skills.desc: My programming language of choice, I have thorough experience with JavaScript, and am learning more efficient techniques through ES 6. Libraries I frequent include jQuery, React.js, and node.js.

skills.name: php
skills.desc: The server-side language behind most of my programs, I use PHP to provide backend for connecting to databases, scanning local files, etc.

skills.name: mysql
skills.desc: The relational database management system behind many of my projects, I have thorough experience querying and sorting through SQL.

skills.name: editors
skills.desc: Two of the most robust and widely used media editors of all time, I have decent experience with Photoshop and Illustrator, from photo editing and typography to optimizing media for web development.
